rules.description: Map Media keys (mute/vol-/vol+; shift: pause/prev/next; alt: ?/brightness-/brigthness+)
Open specific apps using shortcuts (^⌥⌘ something) - z:iTerm, f:finder, e:emacs, v:vim, d:idea, s:safari, c:chrome, x:firefox, a:things
Change caps_lock key to control. (Post escape key when pressed alone)
